description:
At the age of 25, Max is in what he calls a state of "transition."
"Just trying to be more open minded to things," he said. "And to experiment a little bit."
It was pretty obvious what he was talking about.
"You mean maybe experimenting with guys?"
"Yeah."
"Have do you done it yet?"
"I've had thoughts but I've never actually done it," Max replied.
Well this could be fun! Max is a big, beefy, muscle guy with a lot of fur. He says he spends a lot of time working out.
"Do you check out guys at the gym?"
"All the time," he said.
"So when do you think you'll want to be with a guy?"
"Give me a call," he said with a big smile. "And we'll see!"
title: Max
